README.md:
> Open this page at [https://marcopizarro.github.io/biojam-neopixel/](https://marcopizarro.github.io/biojam-neopixel/)

## Use as Extension

This repository can be added as an **extension** in MakeCode.

* open [https://makecode.microbit.org/](https://makecode.microbit.org/)
* click on **New Project**
* click on **Extensions** under the gearwheel menu
* search for **https://github.com/marcopizarro/biojam-neopixel** and import

## Edit this project ![Build status badge](https://github.com/marcopizarro/biojam-neopixel/workflows/MakeCode/badge.svg)

To edit this repository in MakeCode.

* open [https://makecode.microbit.org/](https://makecode.microbit.org/)
* click on **Import** then click on **Import URL**
* paste **https://github.com/marcopizarro/biojam-neopixel** and click import

## Blocks preview

This image shows the blocks code from the last commit in master.
This image may take a few minutes to refresh.

![A rendered view of the blocks](https://github.com/marcopizarro/biojam-neopixel/raw/master/.github/makecode/blocks.png)
